overview: From 2025-02-23 to 2025-03-02, elizaos/eliza had 79 new PRs (69 merged), 10 new issues, and 90 active contributors.

completedItems.title: refactor: plugin local ai new
completedItems.body:
Local models run with cache and models folder empty take some minutes. 
All models and the tokenizer are DL into the models folder
All the files that we use for testing are into the cache folder. 
At startup all the services are tested.

Reduces response latency by optimizing the shouldRespondHandler
Adds debouncing to the message receive handler to prevent excessive processing
Refactors name and username fields

completedItems.title: feat: Add `agent` table and rename `user` to `entity` table, add multi-tenancy
completedItems.body:
This PR splits the `users` table into `agents` and `entities`. Entities is a more general term which could encompass non-user objects in the future.
Platform-specific user data is stored in the `metadata` field.
Agents can be `enabled` wh

completedItems.title: feat: add pglite support & database design
completedItems.body:
## What does this PR do?

This PR refactors our database layer to support both PostgreSQL and PGLite using an injectable connection manager pattern with Drizzle ORM. The main challenge has been fixed by streamlining connection management

completedItems.title: feat: Enable fetching relevant facts in the facts provider.
completedItems.body: For some reason this was commented out. It looks like a great feature to include. Fetching relevant facts in addition to most recent facts is a good idea. I un-commented the code and renamed _embedding to embedding.
